original_text: The king sent officers of his army to keep me safe on the journey. He also sent soldiers who rode on horses. I went to the king's officers on the west side of the Euphrates river. I gave them the letters which the king had written.
korean_text: 군대 장관과 마병을 보내어 나와 함께 하게 하시기로 내가 강 서쪽에 있는 총독들에게 이르러 왕의 조서를 전하였더니

sentences.original_text: The king sent officers of his army
to keep me safe on the journey
sentences.korean_translation: 여행 동안 나를 안전하게 지키기 위해

sentences.original_text: He also sent soldiers who rode on horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 말을 탄 군인들을 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: I went to the king's officers
on the west side of the Euphrates river
